name: Underneath: Dwarven Artifacts
description:
It's a first-person RPG with procedurally- generated levels and loot with innovative character development system based on cooking.

The only way to permanently raise the stats of your character strength, dexterity and intelligence) is by eating different food. The best way is to prepare meals from the ingredients with similar statistics. Experiment with different meals and maybe you'll be able to discover some legendary recipes!

Join the official Discord channel to be up-to-date with new releases and add Your feedback! https://discord.gg/A2aDA9N3p3

Despite the currently used placeholder graphics the game utilizes modern rendering requiring rather strong PC. I didn't yet prepared graphic options and optimization features. Please let me know what your specs are and how the game is performing.
